cases.note: ir/no call-dynamic with mixed partial rules
modules:
package test

p := data.a.b[c] if c := "c"
package a

b[c] := "C" if c := "c"

b["d"] := "D"

package test

p := a[b].c if b := "b"

a.b.c := "C"

a.x.d := "D"

cases.note: ir/no call-dynamic with mixed partial rules, ref heads
modules:
package test

p := a.b[c] if c := "c"

a.b[c] := "C" if c := "c"

a.b.d := "D"

cases.note: ir/call-dynamic with mixed partial rules, ref heads
modules:
package test

p := a[b][c] if {
	b := "b"
	c := "c"
}

a.b.c := "C"

a.x.d := "D"

package test

p := a[b][c].allow if {
	b := "b"
	c := "c"
}

a.b.c.allow := true

a.x.d.allow := true

a.y[x] := "E" if x := "x"

cases.note: ir/call-dynamic with ref heads, issue 5839, penultimate
modules:
package test

p := a[b][c] if {
	b := "b"
	c := "c"
}

a.b.c := true

a.x.d := true

a.y := "E"
